data.value: This is not a translation package for LRFFXIII.

data.value: LIGHTNING RETURNS FINAL FANTASY XIII

data.name: WriteFailed
data.value: An error has occurred: The file could not be written. You may be installing in the read-only directory or the program does not have permissions. Check the directory or run the program below. Administrator rights.

data.name: ReadFailed
data.value: An error has occurred: The file could not be read. It is possible that you are installing in a directory to which the program does not have access permission. Check the directory or run the program as Admin.

data.name: UninstallFailed
data.value:
Uninstallation failed!
LRFF13 may have been uninstalled, or during uninstallation it was interrupted unexpectedly.

data.name: FreeSpace
data.value:
Warning:
To install the translation, the drive must have about 5 GB free. Your drive has {0} free space. Please continue?

data.name: BeginInstall
data.value: When starting the installation, do not close the program. If there are any problems or unexpected closures. Use "Uninstall" and reinstall. Translation by TriboGamer is free. Download the program only from tribogamer.com to avoid insertion of malicious code.
